is.iclt.icenlp.core.tritagger
Class FreqLexicon

java.lang.Object
  is.iclt.icenlp.core.tritagger.FreqLexicon

public class FreqLexicon
extends java.lang.Object

A lexicon with frequency information.
Derives suffix information from the lexicon.
Used by TriTagger

Author:
Hrafn Loftsson
